Regulation Name(s): Creatine Phosphokinase/Creatine Kinase or Isoenzymes Test System
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Dimension EXLTM integrated chemistry system with LOCI module
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Dimension TNI Flex reagent cartridge and CTNI Sample Diluent for quantitative measurement of cardiac troponin I using chemiluminescent immunoassay on Dimension EXLTM system.
Indications for Use Summary: For quantitative measurement of cardiac troponin I in human serum and plasma to aid in the diagnosis of acute myocardial infarction and risk stratification in acute coronary syndromes; CTNI Sample Diluent for manual dilution of samples with elevated cardiac troponin I results.
